de.fraunhofer.fokus.oefit.adhoc.portlet.mgmt

Class ManagementController

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.fraunhofer.fokus.oefit.adhoc.portlet.BaseController
      • de.fraunhofer.fokus.oefit.adhoc.portlet.mgmt.ManagementController

  • @Controller(value="adminController")
@RequestMapping(value="view")
public class ManagementController
extends BaseController
    Controller for the management backend Redirects to mgmt/mgmt by default
